title: Aromatherapy & Crystal Healing
description: Refresh, renew and restore balance with the healing power of aroma-crystal-therapy; 100% pure essential botanical oils with jojoba oil infused with crystals.
cleaned_text: Aromatherapy Infused with Crystals Refresh, renew and restore balance with the healing power of aroma-crystal-therapy. Get your soul-nourishing experience anywhere, anytime with the pocket size roll-on. The dropper makes it easy to energize your space with a Zen essence using your oil burner. Our blends contain 100% pure essential botanical oils with jojoba oil making it safe to rub on your skin. Enjoy the scent and the moisturizing properties. It absorbs quickly, are non-greasy and will never clog pores. The crystals have been energized with the sun and the moon to enhance the purpose and raise the vibration. Once finished with blend, gently wash the crystals and add them to your collection.
